report.title: Species counts league for event
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by warehouse user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN users u ON u.person_id=p.id AND u.deleted=false AND u.id<>1 JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.created_by_id=u.id AND o.record_status<>'R' #filters# #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND p.deleted=false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
